contents.text: Thank you for calling Leadspace in San Francisco, the audience management platform that helps you know your customers from every angle.
For sales and product inquiries, press 1.
To request a product demo or consultation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Set up a product demo to evaluate Leadspace’s capabilities quickly.
Schedule a product demo to see how Leadspace can support my veteran outreach efforts.
Schedule a deep-dive demo on integrating your audience management API with our MarTech stack
I’d like to schedule a product demo to understand how Leadspace works.
I'd like to schedule a demonstration to see how Leadspace can enhance our user segmentation for physics study recruitment.

contents.text: To speak with an account executive, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an account executive.

navigationGoals: Talk to someone about pricing tiers and contract terms.
Speak with an account executive about veteran discount and pricing options for my subscription.
Connect with an account executive to discuss enterprise licensing and volume discounts
I need to speak with an account executive about setting up my account and pricing.
I want to speak with an account executive about academic pricing plans for Leadspace.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a CRM integration error with technical support.
Get technical assistance fixing an error when importing my contact list into Leadspace.
Get troubleshooting support for a 401 authentication error on your REST API endpoint
I’m having trouble logging into my account and need technical support.
I'm encountering errors with the Leadspace API integration in our lab’s CRM and need technical support.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing team.

navigationGoals: Clarify and correct a billing discrepancy on my latest invoice.
Clarify a billing discrepancy on my last invoice and discuss payment options.
Review our recent invoice details and update the credit card on file for billing
I have questions about my invoice and need help with billing.
I have questions about my latest Leadspace invoice and available student discounts.
